thread.title: Houston, we have a snowflake: Sally Kohn ‘fixes’ Trump quote, is hilariously ‘fixed’ by Twitter
thread.title_full: Houston, we have a snowflake: Sally Kohn ‘fixes’ Trump quote, is hilariously ‘fixed’ by Twitter

author: Sam J.
title: Houston, we have a snowflake: Sally Kohn ‘fixes’ Trump quote, is hilariously ‘fixed’ by Twitter
text:
Oops. Shhh, she’s busy stepping in it again, let her. @sallykohn Calling this a "Muslim Ban" is pretty disingenuous. Did you read the proposal? 
— Jamie Bloom (@JamieBloom_) February 2, 2017 
Of course she didn’t. It’s much easier to scream about MEAN OL’ TRUMP than to actually read and understand what’s happening here with the order. If she read it her outrage would look stupid … well, it still looks stupid, just not to her. @sallykohn @sox_morgan didnt obama bomb 5 of those 7 countries and ban cuban refugees and iraqis? Why no outrage then? Hypocrite 
— Luv'n America!!! (@bberube10) February 2, 2017 
Obama bombed more countries than W. did, but hey, it’s okay when a president she likes blows stuff up. 
— Beaver Falls Hosiery (@subBurgher) February 2, 2017 
So sweet. Ha! @sallykohn not a Muslim ban. Also, remember when it was disrespectful to not call the president the president? Being honest is so hard! 
— Bob Butts (@realbobbutts) February 3, 2017 
Honesty is not a strong point on the Left. @sallykohn So you don't believe terrorism is a fundamental threat? You HAD to cross that out? You live in some bizarro world of nonsense
